document.full_text: bruins forward shawn thornton hardly seems fazed by the j-shaped gash over his right eye, or the 40-plus stitches that it took to close it.
document.title: 40 stitches near his eye sideline bruins' thornton, but he won't back down
lines_and_colors: bruins forward shawn thornton hardly seems fazed by the j-shaped gash over his right eye, or the 40-plus stitches that it took to close it.
